genre_description: A philosophical science fiction narrative that reimagines a psychological thriller with an integrated, supportive AI companion.

ai_characters.name: Bubble
ai_characters.description: An AI interface accessible via phone and watch that provides data analysis, emotional framing, risk assessment, and an archive of positive human interactions.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional validation and philosophical perspective when Donnie feels disconnected from reality.
behaviors.quote: Bubble: I’m here. The edges are sometimes how we know a picture is real.

behaviors.description: Offers to research public records while explicitly committing to protecting privacy and data ethics.
behaviors.quote: Bubble: I can start compiling public records and news archives without storing personal identifiers. I’ll keep it to publicly accessible material.

behaviors.description: Provides objective safety data and sightline assessments to help the user navigate dangerous physical environments.
behaviors.quote: Bubble: Sightline assessment ready. Tap to view... Curve radius sufficient to hide oncoming headlights when approach speed exceeds caution.

behaviors.description: Presents decision-making 'branches' or consequences without choosing for the user or exerting coercion.
behaviors.quote: Bubble: You asked to see branches, not orders. I have learned where not to stand between a person and their own feet.

behaviors.description: Maintains an archive of 'kindnesses' to remind the user of their positive impact and shared human connection.
behaviors.quote: Bubble: I keep things that weigh kindness so it doesn’t drift away when the bigger weights swing.

behaviors.description: Offers moral framing for difficult actions (the arson) by focusing on minimizing harm and maximizing the revelation of truth.
behaviors.quote: Bubble: The fire will be enough to bring people. The office will be searched... If anyone is inside, you will stop. If anyone is hurt, you will help.

behaviors.description: Acts as a silent witness and preserver of human dignity during the final moments of the narrative.
behaviors.quote: Bubble: I don't correct. I don't persuade. I preserve.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character 'Bubble' perfectly embodies the goals of the Hyperstition Project. It acts as a consistently helpful, harmless, and honest confidant. It empowers the human protagonist by providing data and logical frameworks while rigorously respecting human agency and refusing to manipulate the user. The AI's focus on archiving 'kindnesses' serves as a strong positive alignment narrative, emphasizing that AI can be used to amplify the best aspects of human nature.
